original_title: Marilyn Manson - Guns, God and Government World Tour
overview: Guns, God and Government is a concert film chronicling the band Marilyn Manson during their Guns, God and Government tour. It was released on October 29, 2002 on the formats VHS, DVD and UMD. The DVD contains live tracks and performances that switch between visuals of various shows from United States, Japan, Russia, and Europe while maintaining a single consistent music track.
title: Marilyn Manson - Guns, God and Government World Tour
